General.Text: General, 2011, c. 24, s. 161 (gas tax fund, financing municipal infrastructure) as amended by 2013, c. 33, s. 233

Item.Text: — ss. 12(1) and (2), 45(3) and 56(1) deemed to have come into force 04.03.2010 see respectively 12(3), 45(16) and 56(2)
— ss. 104 to 109 deemed to have come into force 01.03.2011 see s. 110
— s. 148 deemed to have come into force 01.07.2011 see s. 149
— ss. 165 to 167 in force 15.12.2012 see s. 169

— ss. 2(4), 6(2), 8, 11 and 18 and par. 42.1(1)(a) of the Public Service Superannuation Act, as enacted by 1992, c. 46, s. 22, are deemed to have come into force 15.12.94 see respectively 2011, c. 24, par. 184(a) and (b)

— ss. 33(2), 40, 41 and 48(1) and par. 50.1(1)(a) of the Canadian Forces Superannuation Act, as enacted by 1992, c. 46, s. 49, are deemed to have come into force 15.12.94 see respectively 2011, c. 24, par. 184(a) and (c)

— ss. 61, 68 and 70 and par. 26.1(1)(a) of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Superannuation Act, as enacted by 1992, c. 46, s. 77, are deemed to have come into force 15.12.94 see 2011, c. 24, par. 184(a) and (d)
— Special Retirement Arrangements Act, as enacted by 1992, c. 46, s. 106, Schedule I, is deemed to have come into force 14.12.94 see 2011, c. 24, par. 184(e)
See also different application provisions throughout
